title: Top 10 Stephen King Stories for Halloween (Patreon Clip)
itunes:title: Top 10 Stephen King Stories for Halloween (Patreon Clip)
itunes:subtitle: Here's a preview of our all-new Patreon exclusive episode that finds the Losers celebrating the festival of Samhain by naming 10 Stephen King titles everyone should pull off their bookshelves every October. Special guest includes actress, writer, ...
description:
Here's a preview of our all-new Patreon exclusive episode that finds the Losers celebrating the festival of Samhain by naming 10 Stephen King titles everyone should pull off their bookshelves every October. Special guest includes actress, writer, filmmaker, and podcast host Julia Marchese. Want more? Head on over to www.patreon.com/thebarrens and become a Patron for more exclusive bonus content


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


--Follow Julia Marchese on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram; subscribe to her podcast series Horror Movie Survival Guide; and support her Dollar Baby adaptation of "I Know What You Need".


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
